/usr/bin/c++   -std=c++11 -g -Wall -Wl,--copy-dt-needed-entries    CMakeFiles/2.lighting__2.2.basic_lighting_specular.dir/src/2.lighting/2.2.basic_lighting_specular/basic_lighting_specular.cpp.o  -o bin/2.lighting/2.lighting__2.2.basic_lighting_specular  -L/home/snow2t/Workspace/LearnOpenGL_AVM/lib -rdynamic /usr/local/lib/libglfw3.a -lX11 -lXrandr -lXinerama -lXi -lXxf86vm -lXcursor -lGL -ldl -lpthread -lassimp libSTB_IMAGE.a libGLAD.a -Wl,-rpath,/home/snow2t/Workspace/LearnOpenGL_AVM/lib
